backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling product CRUD, publishing, file uploads, purchases, and user profiles with admin and user access control.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report containing an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing all frontend component and utility files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access denied message with icon and a button to return to the storefront.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFil: Button that triggers PDF file selection and passes the chosen file to a handler, with loading and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header with branding, navigation, authentication state, and role‑aware links.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright, developer tools button, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page wrapper providing global header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product preview card showing title, author, price, and link to details.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first‑time users to submit their name and complete profile setup.
frontend/src/components/RequestUpdateMod: Modal with tabs for update requests, retry commands, and deployment failure report generation using log parsing and fix suggestions.
frontend/src/components/SearchAndFilterB: Search bar component with an input field and icon for filtering by text.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHero.t: Hero section displaying a headline, description, and hero image for the storefront.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, and products via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin interface for creating, editing, deleting, publishing, and uploading files for products, with dialogs and upload progress handling.
frontend/src/pages/BuyerLibraryPage.tsx: Displays purchased products and lets authenticated users download product files with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows product details, handles purchase flow, and displays loading or error states for a single product.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Lists storefront products with search filtering, user profile checks, and loading/error displays.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentCommands.ts: Provides helper functions returning retry and diagnostic commands for deployments.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentFixSuggeste: Generates fix suggestions for deployment errors based on parsed log patterns.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentLogParser.t: Parses deployment logs to identify failing steps and extract relevant error text.
frontend/src/utils/formatDeploymentRepor: Formats parsed deployment data and fix suggestions into a structured failure report string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project's state, requirements, known issues, and existing feature versions.
